planCurrencyToShopCurrency.description: A global action that converts the currency of each plan to the shop's currency.

App.jsx.description: This page handles routing of the frontend pages.

ShopPage.jsx.description: The main page of the app.

BillingPage.jsx.description: The page that renders plans and allows merchants to change between them.

providers/ShopProvider.jsx.description: Provides information about the shop and current subscription to the rest of the app.

plan.description: Used to store data about the available plans.

shopifyShop.description: The default shopifyShop model with additional subscription-related fields.

subscribe.description: Fetches the selected plan's information, calculates the available trial days for the shop, converts the price of the plan to the shop's currency, calls the Shopify API's appSubscriptionCreate GraphQL mutation.

uninstall.description: Updates trial data and removes any subscription related data from the shop record.

GET-confirmation-callback.js.description: The URL called after a merchant has selected a plan and entered payment information in Shopify. It links a shop record to a plan record and redirects the merchant to the Admin UI.

plan.description: The ability to read plans allows merchants to then start the subscription flow.

shopifyShop.description: Giving permissions for a shopify-app-user to use the subscribe action allows them to begin the subscription flow.

webflow.title: Monthly subscription based Shopify billing
webflow.description: Bill Shopify merchants for your app based on a monthly recurring amount.
